settings.text: NOVO CURATED is an independent lifestyle platform that sells best in category products, all under one digital roof.

settings.subtitle: Our Journey
settings.title: NOVO CURATED
settings.text:
I launched NOVO CURATED as an evolution of NOVO; an independent womenswear fashion brand that stood for timeless, elevated wardrobe staples which were made to last a lifetime due to their quality.

Through having a luxury brand, I discovered how passionate I am about championing high quality brands which stand apart from the competition. I'm a big believer that with the right exposure best in class products always shine though. I often find people gravitating towards me to ask for advice when it comes to fashion, beauty and lifestyle products and therefore housing all of my recommendations under one roof that results in a seamless buying journey, made complete sense.

Leanna x

"We carefully choose the fabric we source and test the quality rigorously to make sure that it holds up to the highest standards. Our team then works on developing the most flattering fit, tailoring each piece to cover a specific silhouette and function in order to curate the perfect capsule wardrobe. We only ever work with the best. The best designers, manufacturers and fabric mills - and then each piece is individually signed off by the whole team to make sure that it perfectly encapsulates NOVO's ethos."

- Leanna King, Founder & Creative Director

settings.code:
Creating a Capsule

With designers based in London and a team dedicated to delivering pieces that continuously embody its legacy in Durham, NOVO is a modern fashion house offering attainable-luxury collections.NOVO London provides in-season premium essentials with interchangeable pieces and a perfectly curated edit for trend-led everyday styling. We advocate a capsule wardrobe, focusing on cost per wear to reduce the need to overbuy.Each collection is made in timeless hues, long-lasting quality fabrics, and classic silhouettes. Every NOVO design can be mixed and matched together or with the rest of your wardrobe for endless wear.
